TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Verify the ability to create ObstacleLane (ControlFeature) represented as Line in a nation's C2IS.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates two ObstacleLanes (ControlFeatures) represented as Line with different orientation. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a Topic which includes message elements for Obstacles (belonging in the ControlFeature message schema area), for instance Ground Picture > Mobility/Counter-Mobility. Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the created ObstacleLane ControlFeatures are displayed correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates an ObstacleLane ControlFeature represented as Line with a horizontal orientation.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the ObstacleLane correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates an ObstacleLane ControlFeature represented as Line with a vertical orientation.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the ObstacleLane correctly.
